alert.note: Alert for Dallas (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 17 at 6:25PM CDT until July 17 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Dallas County in southwestern Missouri... * Until 715 PM CDT. * At 625 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles south of Macks Creek, or 15 miles northeast of Buffalo, moving south at 40 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Bennett Spring State Park, Conway, Windyville, Leadmine, Plad, Long Lane and Charity. This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 110 and 111. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
